insert into mz_actionlog (userName, userId, functionid, functionName, `date`, content, `level`, `result`, ip) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mz_actionlog set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionid = #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionName = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `result` = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, userName, userId, functionid, functionName, `date`, content, `level`, `result`, ip from mz_actionlog where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
